ACT
45
WAYS OF ARRANGING PROPERTY RELATIONS
If the spouses did not arrange the property relations after the termination of the marriage by divorce or annulment, or after the termination of the marital union, the property relations can be regulated by a court decision.
If the spouses have not regulated the property relations by agreement on the regulation of the property relations of the spouses after the termination of the marriage or marital union, the provisions of this Act shall apply, and if they are not regulated by this Act, the provisions of the regulations regulating obligations, real and other property relations shall apply .
